comments.body:
I see you're testing both importing the function and importing the module above it using `from [...] import` syntax.  I'm not sure if this code path is walking the ast but if so, it should probably also test:
```
import ansible_collections.testns.testcoll.plugins.module_utils.nested_same.nested_same.nested_same
mu_result = ansible_collections.testns.testcoll.plugins.module_utils.nested_same.nested_same.nested_same.nested_same()
```

Because `import` and `from[...] import` create different ast nodes.
